name: crushing-industry-all-recipes
title: Crushing Industry - All Recipes and Crushers
author: Averax
description: Toggleable vanilla recipes restoration for Crushing Industry mod, to allow the player choice of which recipes to use (crushed vs vanilla ores). Also optionally adds all 3 variants (Vanilla, Crushing w/wo Quality) of crushers to choose from. If Muluna is installed, does the same for Crusher 2.
